domain_classes.label: Investigation
domain_classes.comment: A discrete research effort reported within a reference.

domain_classes.label: Intervention
domain_classes.comment: A policy, program, practice, or treatment being evaluated.

domain_classes.label: Effect Estimate
domain_classes.comment: A quantitative estimate of effect size with associated uncertainty measures.

domain_classes.label: Context
domain_classes.comment: The setting and circumstances in which an investigation took place.

domain_classes.label: Implementer
domain_classes.comment: An organisation or entity responsible for delivering an intervention.

properties.label: Risk Color
properties.description: Color code representing the risk level of a finding.
